description:
The Heave-Ho Trio star in this episode, as they contend with the Revenge of the Bonito.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cagliostro on the Water / Jin and the Tightness of the Mind / Candy Stick Game
Umi no Ue no Kariostro / Jin to Kokoro no Shimari / Yakigashi Game
海の上のカリオストロ / ジンと心のしまり / 焼き菓子ゲーム
